short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search GeoClerk from existing mapping tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** Requires an active GeoClerk subscription to use. ** 

This addon works with Australian State mapping tools to allow GeoClerk subscribers to search for images and the encompassing documents in the area you are looking at directly from existing mapping tools across Australian and Canada. Works with MinView (for NSW), GeoResGlobe (for QLD), GeoVic (for Victoria), GeoView (for Western Australia), SARIG Map (SA), STRIKE (for Northern Territory) and NOPIMS (Offshore), iMapBC (British Columbia), GeoAtlas (Saskatchewan), GeologyOntario (Ontario) and Sigeom (Quebec) document libraries.
